actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: Expressing support of recent actions of the Department of Labor to lift the ban on industrial homework, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that it supports recent actions by the Department of Labor to lift the ban on industrial homework in five industries and encourages the Department to take similar actions in the women's apparel industry.

titles.title: Expressing support of recent actions of the Department of Labor to lift the ban on industrial homework, and for other purposes.
